verses.verse: Faithful <S%G4103><s%> is the <S%G3588><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%>, If <S%G1487><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> seeketh <S%G3713><s%> the office of a bishop <S%G1984><s%>, he desireth <S%G1937><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> work <S%G2041><s%>.

The bishop <S%G1985><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be <S%G1511><s%> without reproach <S%G423><s%>, the husband <S%G435><s%> of one <S%G1520><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%>, temperate <S%G3524><s%>, sober-minded <S%G4998><s%>, orderly <S%G2887><s%>, given to hospitality <S%G5382><s%>, apt to teach <S%G1317><s%>;
no <S%G3361><s%> brawler <S%G269><s%>, no <S%G3361><s%> striker <S%G4131><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> gentle <S%G1933><s%>, not contentious <S%G269><s%>, no lover <S%G866><s%> of money <S%G146><s%>;

one that ruleth <S%G4291><s%> well <S%G2573><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> his children <S%G5043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> subjection <S%G5292><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> gravity <S%G4587><s%>;

(but <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> knoweth <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> how <S%G1492><s%> to rule <S%G4291><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>, how <S%G4459><s%> shall he take care <S%G1959><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>?)
not <S%G3361><s%> a novice <S%G3504><s%>, lest <S%G3361><s%> being puffed <S%G5187><s%> up he fall <S%G1706><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the condemnation <S%G2917><s%> of the devil <S%G1228><s%>.

Moreover <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G846><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> testimony <S%G3141><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them that are without <S%G1855><s%>; lest <S%G3361><s%> he fall <S%G1706><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> reproach <S%G3680><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the snare <S%G3803><s%> of the devil <S%G1228><s%>.

Deacons <S%G1249><s%> in like <S%G5615><s%> manner must be grave <S%G4586><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> double-tongued <S%G1351><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> given to <S%G4337><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> greedy of filthy lucre <S%G146><s%>;
holding <S%G2192><s%> the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of the faith <S%G4102><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a pure <S%G2513><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> let <S%G1381><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> be proved <S%G1381><s%>; then <S%G1534><s%> let them serve as deacons <S%G1247><s%>, if they be <S%G5607><s%> blameless <S%G410><s%>.

Women <S%G1135><s%> in like manner <S%G5615><s%> must be grave <S%G4586><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> slanderers <S%G1228><s%>, temperate <S%G3524><s%>, faithful <S%G4103><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>.

Let <S%G2077><s%> deacons <S%G1249><s%> be <S%G2077><s%> husbands <S%G435><s%> of one <S%G1520><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%>, ruling <S%G4291><s%> their children <S%G5043><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their own <S%G2398><s%> houses <S%G3624><s%> well <S%G2573><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> they that have served well <S%G2573><s%> as deacons <S%G1247><s%> gain <S%G4046><s%> to themselves <S%G1438><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> standing <S%G898><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> boldness <S%G3954><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> which is <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.
These things <S%G5023><s%> write I <S%G1125><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>, hoping <S%G1679><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> shortly <S%G5032><s%>;

but <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> I tarry long <S%G1019><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> thou mayest know <S%G1492><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> men ought <S%G1163><s%> to behave themselves <S%G390><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, which <S%G3748><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%> of the living <S%G2198><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, the pillar <S%G4769><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ground <S%G1477><s%> of the truth <S%G225><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> without controversy <S%G3672><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of godliness <S%G2150><s%>; He <S%G2316><s%> who was manifested <S%G5319><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, Justified <S%G1344><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%>, Seen <S%G3700><s%> of angels <S%G32><s%>, Preached <S%G2784><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%>, Believed on <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, Received up <S%G353><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>.
